tmhushop.title: Toyota Forklifts Shop
tmhushop.desc:
I led a team in building this Fortune 10 company's entry into the world of online sales. Toyota Material Handling U.S.A. (TMHU) was the first division of Toyota Motors to sell directly to consumers while still appeasing their franchise dealers. Our team at Blackstone Media handled the user experience, partnering with another company who managed the SAP Hybris integration. Our design team created the interface while I led the development team in bringing it to life.

The shop was launched with only two variations of one model but was structured for growth as more products are added. This required a lot of research for me to learn various types of user authorization to decide which fit our needs and how to securely store the info. Created flow charts to uncover what data is needed when, at what point to require authorization. Utilizing Vuex for state management to keep all necessary data in sync across components.

cfe.title: Center for Financial Economics
cfe.desc: Created a WordPress site to display a list of articles, defining a pattern for categories to be listed in the array with a conditional for filler tiles to complete the grid. Appending to the list using an AJAX loader to get more posts with the same pattern array, updating the url so the back & refresh buttons operate appropriately. Focused primarily on presenting the article as most visitors will be coming from the newsletter or social media straight to the article, designing a content-centered layout so the reader is free from distractions and a pleasant reading experience.

thebacon.title: The Bacon
thebacon.desc:
Updating quote forms for better user functionality along with some various style & layout updates. Taking the design for the front facing site and integrating across the Rails app.

**Site has since been redesigned**

prolift.title: Prolift Equipment
prolift.desc: ProLift Industrial Equipment is a TMHU dealer with various locations and technicians serving those locations. The new map integration helps visitors find their closest dealer & technicians. Created an intuitive, dynamic page building system for the client based on designed components.

orrsafety.title: ORR Safety
orrsafety.desc: Created static templates from the new design for the client to implement with their CMS, requiring some documentation to aid in their integration. The design presented a couple hurdles to overcome but turned out crisp and clean. The main hero was a little complex to have the content still line up with the container while the background image along with the yellow bar continued to the window's edge. Optimized and generated an SVG sprite for the various icons and illustrations to minimize asset requests for better performance.

louisvillewater.title: Louisville Water
louisvillewater.desc: Designing the new website for a more focused experience. Maximizing on large screens to allow the content to be top priority of attention.

ket.title: KET
ket.desc:
I developed the legislature section by incorporating their data source for program showtimes, using the api to list previous, current, and future episodes. Adapting their current design to create this new feature without requiring design mockups.

Also made various style updates to the site as a whole. Collaborated on the live-banner to notify the visitor of programs currently airing and integrating cookies to hide a program if the visitor wasn't interested. Assisted with an issue with their Google Ads displaying inconsistently due to bloated javascript.

nettango.title: Net Tango
nettango.desc: Handled the design & development of the new company portfolio site with WordPress integration. Optimizing the admin interface for a better content management experience.

downunder.title: Downunder Horsemanship
downunder.desc: Creating a responsive website with a very complex and intricate page layout system to meet all of the client's needs and easily maintain content.

sonomacutrer.title: Sonoma-Cutrer
sonomacutrer.desc: The team at Blackstone Media redesigned and developed the new look for Sonoma-Cutrer Vineyards. I aided in developing templates, altering the checkout styles to match the new design as much as the service would allow, and refining styles for consistency.

tmhu.title: Toyota Forklifts
tmhu.desc:
After launching the e-commerce site for Toyota Material Handling U.S.A. (TMHU), we worked on improving the quality of their marketing website. Blackstone Media had previously handled their redesign a couple years prior but a number of features had been added since and needed some restructuring. This would provide better maintenance, SEO management and content creation while also taking advantage of WordPress' newer REST API.

The refactoring didn't change the design but enabled us to refine some areas for consistency while modernizing the code to utilize flex layouts, rem sizing and Vue templating. The theme was created as a PHP & Vue hybrid for a potential conversion to a true Single-Page Application.

As the thought leader on the project, I provided direction on code structure for maintenance, naming conventions, and delegating tasks to coworkers appropriate to their skillset. When I wasn't answering questions or assisting other's I was typically staying up late configuring the Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) page builder along with the necessary custom REST API endpoints. The new ACF implementation aided the client's content management by creating a hub of data, this removed a great deal of copy & pasting that they were previously required to handle providing more consistency throughout their site.

zanvartis.title: Zanvartis
zanvartis.desc:
Designing and developing a proof of concept portfolio piece for a pharmaceutical sales dashboard. Designed the logo, graph, table & date picker and developed all the user experience functionalities.

**Site is no longer active**

cityofirvine.title: City of Irvine
cityofirvine.desc: Provided designs for this government website focused on content and accessibility. I handled the front-end development while a coworker constructed the Drupal configuration. Wrote a script for font-size controls and custom language toggling, along with a rather complex responsive main menu.

louisvilleky.title: Louisville Metro
louisvilleky.desc: Designing a minimalistic, content-focused layout to highlight photography and readability.

hilliardlyons.title: Hilliard Lyons
hilliardlyons.desc: Created a new look for based on new promotional material to be used across their multiple sites. Non-responsive site built on asp.net.
